name: EquipmentCatalog
comment: Contains the details of all the equipment that is available for sale.Examples of equipment includes:* iPhone 6* Galaxy S7
vf short description: Contains the details of all the equipment that is available for sale.Examples of equipment includes:* iPhone 6* Galaxy S7

fields.name: EquipmentCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: EquipmentCatalogKey
fields.comment: Specifies the general key for the equipment catalog. Generated key based on Equipment Catalog Id

fields.name: EquipmentTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: EquipmentCatalogDesc
fields.comment: Indicates the name of the item in the catalog. ProductSpecification.description.value where ProductSpecification.description.locale = en-US

fields.name: EquipmentBrandSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: TacNumber
fields.comment: Indicates a part of the IMEI number for an equipment.  This number can be used to find the manufacture and the brand type of the equipment. //Customized

fields.name: ItemCatalogCreationDate
fields.comment: Indicates the time at which this item was created.

fields.name: EquipmentCatalogId
fields.comment: Relevant product catalog Id for a particular equipment. For example, iPhone 6 and Samsung Galaxy S4. ProductSpecification.id

fields.name: ProductCatalogSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: MarketingName
fields.comment: Specifies the marketing model name of the device. For example, Nexus 5. ProductSpecification.name.value where ProductSpecification.name.locale = en-US

fields.name: InternalModelName
fields.comment: Specifies the internal name of the device used by the manufacturer. For example, LG LG-D821. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX //Customized - XXX ; Model

fields.name: ManufacturerName
fields.comment: Manufacturer name. For example, LG Electronics. Inc. //Customized

fields.name: Band
fields.comment: Radio bands supported by the device. For example, GSM 1800, GSM 1900, GSM 900, GSM850 (GSM800), LTE FDD BAND 1, LTE FDD BAND 20, LTE FDD BAND 3, LTE FDD BAND 5, LTE FDD BAND 7, LTE FDD BAND 8, WCDMA FDD Band I, WCDMA FDD Band II, WCDMA FDD Band IV, WCDMA FDD Band V, WCDMA FDD Band VI, WCDMA FDD Band VIII. //Customized

fields.name: AllocationDate
fields.comment: Equipment allocation date. //Customized

fields.name: CountryCode
fields.comment: Manufacturing country code. //Customized

fields.name: FixedCode
fields.comment: Specifies the fixed code used for the equipment. For example, MANU. //Customized

fields.name: ManufacturerCode
fields.comment: Manufacturer code. For example, 210114. //Customized

fields.name: RadioInterface
fields.comment: Radio interface. //Customized

fields.name: OperatingSystem
fields.comment: Operating system. For example, Android and Not Known. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX //Customized - XXX ;Operating_System

fields.name: NfcFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether Near Field Communication is supported. //Customized

fields.name: BluetoothFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether bluetooth is supported. //Customized

fields.name: WlanFlag
fields.comment: Indicates if WLAN is supported or not. //Customized

fields.name: SimTypeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the sim type whether nano, micro, regular and so on. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: SIM_Type XX: en-US

fields.name: ColourInd
fields.comment: Indicates the colour of the equipment. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: Color XX: en-US

fields.name: WeightInd
fields.comment: Indicates the weight of the equipment. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: Weight XX: en-US

fields.name: MemorySizeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the memory size of the equipment. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: Memory_Size XX: en-US

fields.name: ScreenSizeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the screen size of the equipment. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: Screen_Size XX: en-US

fields.name: WarrantyDuration
fields.comment: Indicates the warranty duration of the equipment. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: Warranty_Duration XX: en-US

fields.name: SkuInd
fields.comment: Indicates the stock keeping unit of the equipment. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: SKU XX: en-US

fields.name: CameraResolution
fields.comment: Indicates the camera resolution of the equipment. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: CameraResolution XX: en-US.

fields.name: SizeInd
fields.comment: Indicates the size of the equipment. ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.value Where ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.name = XXX  and ProductSpecification.productSpecCharacteristic.productSpecCharacteristicValue.localizedValue.locale = XX //Customized - XXX: Size XX: en-US

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
